title: Ticket #6844: Assume all schedds support QMGMT_WRITE_CMD
description: When using ConnectQ() to make a write-read connection to the schedd, remove the fallback to the read-only command if the schedd's version is old or unknown. The separate read-write command has been supported since 7.5.0, but several clients still employ the fallback because they don't pass a version object into ConnectQ().
remarks:

CODE_REVIEW : looks good. just needs version history.

All reasonable versions of the schedd support QMGMT_WRITE_CMD, yet some clients don't pass in the schedd [...] (By Jaime Frey )
